message: Let's split it 80/20, a fair start?
I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not giving away too much too early!
Meet me in the middle, Bob?
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm getting closer to what I want!
Getting closer to a deal, Bob?
I'm getting greedy, you can't blame me!
Last chance for a decent split, Bob?
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're really running out of options, Alice...
Last chance, Bob. Take this or we both walk away with nothing.
I'll take what's left, you're getting nothing!
